author: myrnavl
msg: switching the test to use TimeZoneTestSetup which already has the required privilege blocks.

author: stefan2
msg: Replace local code in svnserve with the new svn_root_pools__* API.
Use separate pools for the many small socket objects and the few,
The number of connections to a svnserve instance now increases its
memory consumption by less than 100kB per additional connection.
release_shared_pool): add the root pools container so we can return
serve_thread): use a separate root pool container for connections
(main): init the new root pool containers;
use a socket pool instead of connection pool

author: stefan2
msg: Follow-up r1527140: fix duplicate definition error

author: stefan2
msg: Introduce a small new private API that allows for recycling root pools
as piloted by svnserve in r1523465.  Provide some basic testing as well.
